Japan's message for Donald Trump: don't cut a deal with ChinaJapan has been trying to send a message to US presidential hopeful Donald Trump: don't try to strike any deal with China that could upend years of collective efforts to rein in Beijing. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 01:04:53 GMT OPMFU3OYNBIYDCFHL2UYYX3KBE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-message-donald-trump-dont-cut-deal-with-china-2024-02-02/John Geddie, Tim Kelly, Yoshifumi Takemoto世界亚太地区
Dollar poised for weekly decline; US jobs data up nextThe dollar fell broadly on Friday in a bout of positive risk sentiment following upbeat big tech earnings on Wall Street, while traders awaited U.S. jobs data due later in the day to gauge how soon the Federal Reserve could begin easing rates. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 01:01:35 GMT 2DKAHVEGGZMW3HCQX76RZ3IBSE https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-poished-weekly-decline-us-jobs-data-up-next-2024-02-02/Rae Wee市场货币
Apple iPhone target is billions short of Wall Street's as China sales lagApple on Thursday forecast a drop in iPhone sales and targeted overall revenue $6 billion below Wall Street expectations as its China business took a hit. India to keep spending on border roads after 30% budget overrun on China fearsIndia's government will maintain increased funding to build roads near its China border after spending 30% more on them this fiscal year than planned, it said on Thursday, citing tension between the two nuclear-armed neighbours. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:46:05 GMT DZ57PAWNWJLDRBZOZ2神秘https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-keep-spending-border-roads-after-30-budget-overrun-china-fears-2024-02-01/Krishn Kaushik世界印度
Canada Goose rides on China luxury demand recovery to forecast strong quarterCanada Goose Holdings , forecast fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Thursday, as the luxury goods maker bets on a sharp rebound in crucial market China to help ride out a slowdown in the U.S. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 11:55:27 GMT NIZYLICU5FODPLB7BDBB5TUJ2Y https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/canada-goose-misses-quarterly-revenue-expectations-2024-02-01/Aatrayee Chatterjee, Ananya Mariam Rajesh商业零售与消费品
Exclusive: China tells Ukraine to remove its firms from 'sponsors of war' listChina demanded on Thursday that Ukraine immediately remove more than a dozen Chinese companies from a list of firms designated as "international sponsors of war", saying it wanted Kyiv to "eliminate negative impacts".
